reviewText: John Tatro of Alsip, Illinois guest appeared on this album, playing his belly. He is the best at playing lead belly!!!  He has about 5 bellys so he has a great range of blubber sounds... As far as the DVD, Ritchie Blackmore is the king of the guitar, what is he doing playing medieval music with the bimbo??? Grab Dio and start up rainbow again, dude!!!  Metal is not dead!!!
I very much enjoyed this set. I recommend this set to any RAINBOW fan! The audio recording on this DVD is awesome!

I've been a fan of Ritchie's for over 35 years. And I've got to say that this is Richtie at his best. I've seen Ritchie play in Rainbow 2 times, Deep Purple (Perfect Strangers Tour) and Blackmore's Night 2 times. Dio's vocals and Cozy's drumming are outstanding. Ritchie's solos are brilliant as always. Must buy for true fans.

This DVD is not "ON STAGE / Live in MUNCHEN 20.10.1977""

This contains a different concert. (not the same as described in "Product Description")

Don't Be A Fool !!!
This is a fantastic collection. The audio quality is high and in Dolby Surround . I highly recommend this one. A++++++++++
